page.title: Protocols Overview
page.introduction: Protocols are additional modeling capabilities that are available to users to enhance their models. Protocols are specified at the application level.

operations.para: Protocols can be accessed by clicking the Protocols item under any Application in the 'Navigation' panel tree structure. This selects the Protocols tab for the application in the 'View' panel on the right. The 'Protocols' tab has different sub-tabs depending on the type of application.

list.item: Electrical mapping protocols are available for all Application types.
Events are available for Non-spatial Deterministic (ODE) Applications.
Rate Rules and Assignment Rules are available for Non-spatial Determininistic (ODE) Applications.
Microscope Measurements are available for Spatial Deterministic (PDE) Applications.
